model_answer: The answer is C: [00:05:10 - 00:06:19]. The speaker shows an AI timeline in the beginning of his speech up until slide 6, which transitions into a discussion on digital ethics. This is indicated by the change in slides as well as the content of the speech mentioning ethical considerations regarding AI.

The answer is A: [00:07:09 - 00:07:37]. In this segment, the presenter starts by showing two cartoon robots holding "Del/Alt/Ctr" signs, which are keyboard shortcuts, followed by a giant "Esc" key. Then, he makes a remark about companies like Microsoft doing the right thing with technology and directly asks the audience, "Who will be mission control for humanity?"
